description: The INTVTN_CONTACT table contains information about care plan intervention records. This information includes the unique ID of the intervention, its frequency, and data on edits made.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the intervention record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CONTACT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The contact type category ID for this intervention. This column is commonly used to differentiate edits from documentation instances.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Edit


Document

columns.name: EDIT_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the intervention was last edited.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user who edited the care plan intervention data. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: CARE_PLAN_CSN
columns.description: The link to the unique contact serial number for this care plan contact. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI). This column is used to recreate historic versions of a care plan.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: Stores the visit this intervention documentation event was done in.

columns.name: HAS_NOTE_EDIT_YN
columns.description:
Y means that, for this reading, the default smarttext has been pulled in at least once.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: READING_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Documents when the original reading contact was documented. Used to order active documentation readings in the order they clinically happened.

columns.name: NAME_DISPLAY
columns.description: The display name of the intervention.

columns.name: UPDATED_INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: This item links to the newly created intervention ID that was made when this original intervention was completed and updated.

columns.name: REASON_FOR_UPDATE
columns.description: Contains the reason as to why this element was resolved and updated.

columns.name: INTV_RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID
columns.description: The responsible user for the intervention.

columns.name: INTV_RESPONSIBLE_IB_POOL_ID
columns.description: The responsible pool for the intervention.

columns.name: INTV_RESPONSIBLE_IB_POOL_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: LINKED_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Stores the episode associated with the intervention's care plan.
